title: The Dark-Hunters: Infinity, Vol. 2
description: A manga adaptation of Sherrilyn Kenyonâ€™s Chronicles of Nick series, a prequel to the immensely popular Dark-Hunter novels. A young, streetwise Nick Gautier meets Dark-Hunter Kyrian of Thrace, who shows Nick a world of vampires, demons, and zombies far more dangerous than the mean streets of New Orleans. A must-read for existing fans and those new to the supernatural world of the Dark-Hunters!
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon
